faqs.question: How do admins or managers order a physical or virtual card?
faqs.answer: Admins and managers can order cards by navigating to Home > Card > Cards > Issue or Request Card. Select the card type, complete the required information, verify the shipping address if applicable, and click Issue Card. If the recipient is not yet on Nitra, they must be added first.

faqs.question: How does an employee request a physical card?
faqs.answer: Employees can request a physical card by going to Home > Card > Cards > Issue or Request Card, selecting the card type, completing the required details, and submitting the request for approval.

faqs.question: How long does it take to receive a physical card?
faqs.answer: Once approved, physical cards are processed within 1â€“3 days and shipped with tracking using 2-day shipping. Tracking information is available on the Nitra dashboard.

faqs.question: Can I update my shipping address or name on a physical card?
faqs.answer: Yes. To update your shipping address or name before receiving the card, you must cancel the card, update the information, and reissue the card.

faqs.question: What are the delivery statuses for a physical card?
faqs.answer: Delivery statuses include Ordered (being prepared), In Transit (shipped), and Delivered (arrived at the delivery address).

faqs.question: How do I request a virtual card?
faqs.answer: Admins, owners, and managers can request a virtual card by navigating to Home > Card > Cards > Issue or Request Card, selecting Virtual Card, entering the required information, and issuing the card. Virtual cards are available immediately after approval.

faqs.question: Are there country restrictions on card usage?
faqs.answer: Yes. To make purchases outside the United States, the country must be added as an approved country under Merchant Country Restrictions in the card settings.

faqs.question: How do I add a spend limit to a card?
faqs.answer: Select the card and configure a spending limit under Card Spend Limit.

faqs.question: What can cashback rewards be redeemed for?
faqs.answer: Cashback rewards can be redeemed for card statement payments, eChecks, travel bookings, gift cards, and NitraMart purchases. Cashback points do not expire.

faqs.question: How do I apply cashback to a card statement?
faqs.answer: Go to the Rewards tab, select Cashback, enter the amount you want to redeem, and apply it to your statement. The redemption applies to the relevant statement period.

faqs.question: How do I redeem cashback for gift cards?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Rewards, select the desired gift card, choose the recipient and amount, and complete redemption. The recipient will receive the digital gift card via email within 24 hours.

faqs.question: How do I redeem cashback for travel?
faqs.answer: To redeem cashback for travel, contact your Account Manager, who will assist with booking flights and accommodations using your points.

faqs.question: What is NitraMart cashback redemption?
faqs.answer: Redeeming cashback on NitraMart provides an additional 10% value.

faqs.question: How do I upload an invoice to Bill Pay?
faqs.answer: Invoices can be uploaded by emailing them from a company email address to your Nitra AP inbox or by manually uploading them through the Bills Drafts page using the New Bill button.

faqs.question: What file types are supported for invoice uploads?
faqs.answer: PDF and JPG invoice files are supported.

faqs.question: What happens after an invoice is uploaded?
faqs.answer: Nitra extracts invoice details including vendor name, invoice number, payment information, and line items. You can review and confirm the drafted bill before continuing.

faqs.question: Where do bills go for approval?
faqs.answer: Bills awaiting approval appear in the Bills for Approval tab, where approvers can review, approve, reject, or send reminders.

faqs.question: Can I cancel a bill after submission?
faqs.answer: Bills can only be canceled while they are in draft status. Once submitted for approval, they cannot be canceled.

faqs.question: What is a custom Bill Pay approval workflow?
faqs.answer: A custom approval workflow allows organizations to manage bill approvals based on conditions such as submitter, amount, category, role, or department.

faqs.question: What user roles are available in Nitra?
faqs.answer: Nitra offers Admin, Manager, Employee, and Bookkeeper roles, each with different permissions and responsibilities.

faqs.question: What permissions do Admins have?
faqs.answer: Admins have full access, including configuring organization settings, managing users and spending, integrating accounting systems, and reviewing statements.

faqs.question: What permissions do Managers have?
faqs.answer: Managers can invite users, issue cards and funds, and oversee spending for their teams.

faqs.question: What permissions do Employees have?
faqs.answer: Employees can make purchases with their assigned cards but cannot invite users or issue cards.

faqs.question: What permissions do Bookkeepers have?
faqs.answer: Bookkeepers have read-only access to assist with accounting and expense management.

faqs.question: How do I invite a user to Nitra?
faqs.answer: Go to Organization > People, click Invite People, select a role, fill in the required fields, and send the invite. Invited users receive an email with a secure signup link.

faqs.question: How can receipts be submitted to Nitra?
faqs.answer: Receipts can be submitted via SMS by texting NITRA (648-72), by emailing receipts@nitra.com, or by uploading directly through the platform.

faqs.question: Does Nitra support automatic receipt matching?
faqs.answer: Yes. Nitra automatically matches receipts to transactions across multiple languages, currencies, and countries.

faqs.question: What receipt file formats are supported?
faqs.answer: Supported formats include JPG, JPEG, PNG, and PDF.

faqs.question: How do I view my card statements?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Card > Statements to view current and historical statements. Statements can be downloaded as PDFs.

faqs.question: When are card payments processed?
faqs.answer: Payments made before 11:00 AM EST are processed the same business day. Payments after that time are processed the next business day.

faqs.question: What auto-pay options are available?
faqs.answer: Nitra offers Regular Auto-Pay, which pays before the due date, and Smart Auto-Pay, which triggers payments based on balance or credit utilization thresholds.

faqs.question: How do I verify a bank account?
faqs.answer: Log in to app.nitra.com, choose manual verification, enter your bank details, locate the micro-deposit in your bank account, and enter the verification code in Nitra.

faqs.question: How many bank accounts can be connected?
faqs.answer: Two bank accounts can be connected: one for Nitra Card payments and ACH wires, and one for Bill Pay check or e-check payments.

faqs.question: Which accounting software does Nitra integrate with?
faqs.answer: Nitra integrates with QuickBooks (Desktop and Online), Sage, Xero, and Oracle NetSuite.

faqs.question: What accounting integration options are available?
faqs.answer: Nitra supports Bank Feeds for automatic transaction syncing and Accounting Automation for rule-based transaction mapping and manual pushes.

faqs.question: What are accounting rules?
faqs.answer: Accounting rules automatically map Nitra transaction fields to accounting system fields to ensure consistent categorization.

faqs.question: What is the accounting rules hierarchy?
faqs.answer: Rules are applied in this order: Card Rules override General Rules, which override Default Rules.
